tweet: @CjLakin We’ll try to move your number between 11am and 5pm, sometimes it can take until midnight. We’ll text to let you know when it’s done. When your number has transferred, you might lose service for around 20 minutes. You also might need to turn your phone on and off as well. Mac
name: Vodafone UK

tweet: @CjLakin You'd need a PAC to keep your number. You can text the word PAC to 65075 to begin the process of leaving (or contact EE). They'll reply by text within a minute with your PAC, which will be valid for 30 days. You can then give the PAC to us and we'll take care of the rest 👍 Mac
name: Vodafone UK
